Tryyum amụ̄ sund gczihh nh khaṣ pnnhi dhat kise aṣlaḥ v flaḥs petth qnaʿt krun blkh gczihh qvm v miltuk ajtmạʿī mfad pyshi nẓr thavun. Yylhi zh mslman panh vạnụ̄ mlaqat krn tihund gczihh pnnhi qvl v fʿl sintụ̄ pzis dyns th prth mʿāmls mtʿlq pzr th ṣdaqt akhtyar krnuk tạkyd krun. Czvurim gvv prth akụ̄ snz gczihh byyis shkhṣs yhe nṣyḥt th vṣyt krnụ̄ kh pazih kis mʿāmls th shkhṣy ya qvmy aṣlaḥ chh vathi andr yim tklyf th yimh skhty th dshvạry pysh yin ya khlafi ṭbyʿt pyyhi, bʿẓe chyzn petth tḥml krun timn petth gczihh ṣbr v astqamt sintụ̄ kạm hynụ̄. Kunhi ṣvrts andr gczihh nh nykyn kun pad pvt phyrun th sust spdun. Yim khosh qsmt lvukh czon ṣftn hund jamʿ āsn, panh kạml ạsith byyn lvukn kạml bnavnch kvshish krn tihund nav rvzi hmyshh vjvdkis dftrs andr mvjvd, tihndụ̄ āthar rvzn bṭvr baqyat alṣalḥat tihndis ajr v thvabs hmyshh trqy divan. Ḥqyqts andr chhu yhi mkhtṣr th lokutt svrh shryfh mgr sary dyn v ḥkmtuk khlaṣh th jvhr. Ḥẓrt amam shafʿī ạsụ̄ frmavan kh hrgah sary qrāni mjyd andrh yuhae aakh svrh shryfh prnh yiyhi ha, ʿạql dana th smjh dar bndn hndi khạṭrh avs yuhae aakh svrh shryfh kạfy.
